summary: An ordinance relating to the general municipal election to be held on March 8, 1927; providing for the submission thereat of the proposed charter amendment contemplated by Resolution No. 8870; requiring the City Comptroller and Ex-officio City Clerk to certify to the Election Board of King County, Washington, as required by law, said proposed amendment in the form of a specified ballot title, and said amendment in full, and declaring an emergency.
